channel.title: CVE Feed for tomlister -- Payflex Payment Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tomlister -- Payflex Payment Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-0619|2024-07-11T14:01:37.344Z -- tomlister -- payflex%20payment%20gateway
item.description: The Payflex Payment Gateway plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the payment_callback() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the status of orders, which can potentially lead to revenue loss.

item.title: CVE-2024-0619|2024-07-11T03:33:20.077Z -- tomlister -- payflex%20payment%20gateway
item.description: The Payflex Payment Gateway plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the payment_callback() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the status of orders, which can potentially lead to revenue loss.
